title: Otomedius Excellent
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  It's time to SHOOT THE CORE in this all-new Gradius-style shooter, featuring the lovely ladies of OTOMEDIUS in their first North American appearance.

childDownloads.title: Aoba Anoa (St. Gradius Academy Uniform)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Aoba Anoa wearing her St. Gradius Academy uniform.

childDownloads.title: Arvnal (Summer Kimono)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Arvnal wearing a yukata (summer kimono).

childDownloads.title: BGM Pack 1: Aoba Anoa
childDownloads.description: Download BGM Pack 1: Aoba Anoa to enjoy stage BGM themed for this character.

childDownloads.description: Download BGM Pack 10: Strarf to enjoy stage BGM themed for this character.

childDownloads.description: Download BGM Vol 6: Esmeralda and Poini Kune to enjoy stage BGM themed for these characters.

childDownloads.title: Diol Twee (Heirloom Dress)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Diol Twee wearing a beautiful dress she inherited from her ancestors.

childDownloads.title: DLC Anoa/Eru/Madoka (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the Aoba Anoa St. Gradius Academy Uniform, Erul Tron  Legendary Pilot Suit, or Madoka Dynastic Dress addons, you can still download this library to be matched with other players who have this content.

childDownloads.title: DLC Diol/Tita/Esmeralda (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the Diol Twee Heirloom Dress, Tita Nium Bacterian Force Uniform, or Esmeralda Restaurant Uniform addons, you can still download this library to be matched with other players who have this content.

childDownloads.title: DLC Donburi Island Stage (Library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the Donburi Island Stage addon, download this library to be able to view replays that include content from this stage.

childDownloads.title: DLC Poini/Hanafuuma/Arnval (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the Poini Kune Apron Dress, Gesshi Hanafuuma P.E. Outfit, or Arvnal Summer Kimono addons, you can still download this library to be matched with other players who have this content.

childDownloads.title: DLC St. Gradius Academy Stage (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the St. Gradius Academy Stage addon, download this library to be able to view replays that include content from this stage.

childDownloads.title: DLC Yebisuboshi Stage (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own the Yebisuboshi Stage addon, download this library to be able to view replays that include content from this stage.

childDownloads.title: Donburi Island Stage
childDownloads.description: We've got an emergency call from Pastel that Bacterians are invading Donburi Island! Please rush to the scene immediately. Pastel is voiced by Shina Hekiru.

childDownloads.title: Erul Tron (Legendary Pilot Suit)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Erul Tron wearing a Legendary Pilot Suit from Donburi Island.

childDownloads.title: Esmeralda (Restaurant Uniform)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Esmeralda wearing her restaurant uniform.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Pics Anoa/Erul/Madoka/Diol/Tita
childDownloads.description: Includes gamer pictures for Aoba Anoa, Erul Tron, Madoka, Diol Twee, and Tita Nium.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Pics Esmeralda/Poini/Hanafuuma/Arnval/HAnoa
childDownloads.description: Includes gamer pictures for Esmeralda, Poini Kune, Gesshi Hanafuuma, Arnval, and Hyper Anoa.

childDownloads.title: Gesshi Hanafuuma (P.E. Outfit)
childDownloads.description: Download this DLC to play as Gesshi Hanafuuma wearing her St. Gradius Academy P.E. uniform.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Pics Strarf/Kokoro/Venom/Operetta/DF
childDownloads.description: Includes gamer pictures for Strarf, Kokoro Belmont, Venom, Operetta, and Dark Force.

childDownloads.title: Kokoro Belmont
childDownloads.description: Purchase Kokoro Belmont as a playable character. Descended from a legendary line of vampire hunters, she lends her unique powers to "G".

childDownloads.title: Kokoro Belmont (library)
childDownloads.description: If you do not own Kokoro Belmont, you can still download this library to be matched with other players who have this content.

childDownloads.title: Madoka (Dynastic Dress)
childDownloads.description: Purchase this DLC to play as Madoka wearing a Dynastic Dress.
